message: Let's start with a simple split, Bob. 60/40 seems fair considering the inflation working against me.
Your split was a good starting point, Alice.  How about we meet a bit more in the middle? This considers the inflation working against both of us.
I appreciate the movement, Bob, but I need a bit more to account for the faster inflation on my end. This offer still gives you a good chunk.
Alice, this deal gives us both a better share than our previous offers. Let's close this out and secure a win-win.
